name: Ganapatsinh Vaghela
review: I had a great visit and the doctor's demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this clinic.

name: Sumit Pujara
review: Clean and pleasant environment at first impression, supportive staff and doctor Jaydip is a unique personality, friendly nature, has a deep understanding of the subject

name: Abhishek Gol
review: Excellent Doctors and staff. Dr. Neil sir is very cooperative and friendly in nature and the way he explains everything is great.

name: Mahesh Vala
review: Expert opinion and value guidance. Thanks thank you Dr. Rini Lathiya and staff.

name: Thakkar Rutul
review: One of the best team of neurologist doctors in ahmedabad. Dr Jaydeep sir and Dr Jatin sir guidance was so superb and helpful.

name: Dhaval Gohil
review: Amazing Experience with Mr. Jaydeep Sir. Great experience. Kind polite and really trustworthy.
